entries.name: new(block_parser)
entries.desc: Creates a new parser for inline markup in the rd format.  The block_parser is used to for footnotes and labels in the inline text.

entries.name: inline(rdoc, reference = rdoc)
entries.desc: Creates a new RDoc::RD::Inline for the rdoc markup and the raw reference

entries.name: next_token()
entries.desc: Returns the next token from the inline text

entries.name: on_error(et, ev, values)
entries.desc: Raises a ParseError when invalid formatting is found

entries.name: parse(inline)
entries.desc: Parses the inline text from RD format into RDoc format.
